title: What is watch time and view time in YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: Watch time of someone’s youtube channel is the total number of minutes for which their videos are watched in a particular time period. View time of someone’s youtube channel is the total number of views that their channel has got in a particular time period. You can check your channel’s watch time and view time on PC with the help of YouTube dashboard… You can check your channel’s watch time and view time on Mobile with the help of youtube studio app…
